'''Peter Pracownik''' ([[19 October]], [[1951]] - [[August 15]], [[2024]]) was a New Age / Fantasy artist and sculptor who was born in [[wikipedia:Bristol|Bristol]], [[wikipedia:England|England]] and  lived most of his life in [[wikipedia:Glastonbury|Glastonbury]], before moving to [[wikipedia:North_Cornwall|North Cornwall]] later in life. He was an active artist for over 30 years since his professional debut in 1989, providing art for collectible cards, posters and music album covers. 

In [[1997]], Pracownik created illustrations for the [[The Lord of the Rings Tarot|Lord of the Rings Tarot Deck & Card Game]] along with artist Terry Donaldson and Mike Fitzgerald. In [[2012]], Donaldson and Pracownik collaborated again on [[The Hobbit Tarot]]. He was commisioned to create a Lord Of The Rings poster for Wizard and Genius.  

Pracownik had two children with his first wife, Julie:<ref name = "BookBio"></ref> Rebecca<ref name = "BookBio"></ref> and Oisin.<ref>The Enchanted World of Peter Pracownik - Dedication</ref> Peter and Julie separated in 1991.<ref name = "BookBio"></ref> He married artist Nicola-Claire Lydon in 2010<ref>[https://www.flickr.com/photos/raggedyrags/5063995277 Bespoke bridal outfit made for Nicola and peter wedding]</ref> and they co-owned the Another Green World art gallery and store.<ref>[https://web.archive.org/web/20120915002447/http://www.peterpracownik.com/pages/about.htm About - Peter Pracownik and Another Green World]</ref>
